name: Weather Checker
description: Get current weather for any city
backend_requirements: GET /api/weather?city=name - proxy request to OpenWeatherMap or similar free API
Return JSON: temperature, condition, humidity, city name
Cache results for 15 minutes to avoid API rate limits
Handle API errors and return user-friendly messages
frontend_requirements: City input field with search button
Display temperature in Celsius/Fahrenheit with toggle
Show weather condition with appropriate icon
Error message for invalid city or API failure
